text: Veruyushchiye! Kogda pridut k vam veruyushchiya izgnannitsy, to vy ispytyvayte ikh (Bog vpolne znayet veru ikh). Yesli uznayete, chto oni veruyushchiye, to ne vozvrashchayte ikh k nevernym: one ne zakonny dlya tekh, a te ne zakonny dlya sikh: otdavayte im, chto oni izderzhali na nikh. Vam net grekha zhenit'sya na nikh, kak skoro vy dadite im veno, kakoye sleduyet im. Ne uderzhivayte pri sebe osheynikov na nevernykh: trebuyte s nikh, chto vy upotrebili na soderzhaniye etikh; pust' i te trebuyut s vas, chto upotrebili oni na soderzhaniye sikh.
